Class RocketSmoke

  • java.lang.Object
    • helicopterbattle.RocketSmoke

  • public class RocketSmoke
extends java.lang.Object
    Rocket smoke. Use: create object of this class then initialize it with Initialize method.

    • Method Detail

      • Initialize

        public void Initialize(int xCoordinate,
              int yCoordinate,
              long gameTime,
              long smokeLifeTime)
        Initialize object.
        Parameters:
        xCoordinate - X coordinate of this piece of rocket smoke.
        yCoordinate - Y coordinate of this piece of rocket smoke.
        gameTime - The current elapsed game time in nanoseconds.
        smokeLifeTime - How long must the smoke be drawn on a screen?
        image - Image of rocket smoke.

      • updateTransparency

        public void updateTransparency(long gameTime)
        Sets new transparency for rocket smoke image. Older the smoke, more transparent is image of smoke.
        Parameters:
        gameTime - The current elapsed game time in nanoseconds.

      • didSmokeDisapper

        public boolean didSmokeDisapper(long gameTime)
        Checks if rocket smoke is old enough to remove it.
        Parameters:
        gameTime - The current elapsed game time in nanoseconds.
        Returns:
        True if the smoke should be removed, false otherwise.

      • Draw

        public void Draw(java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Draws a piece of a rocket smoke to the screen.
        Parameters:
        g2d - Graphics2D
